Hellpeon smirked as he stood there calmly the insult not having 
changed his expression.

Hellpeon: "It is my belief that lesser beings go first. So go you 
wretched piece of metal let's see how powerful you really are."

--- In nbwrpg@y..., gunthers8@n... wrote:
> Ultimo Campeon looks over the energy being.  "If I am a squire, you 
are a hand maid." he sais smirking at the judgement of Hellpeon.  
Ultimo was the the utlimate fighting machine.  He would take this guy 
out like that.  "How would you like to start, since I will wipe the 
floor with you anyway, I will givey ou this one advantage he says 
proping his axe on his shoulder in a leisuerly pose.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., Legendarynemasis@a... wrote:
> > After having flown past and out of the Oteybis defenses some time 
ago, 
> > Hellpeon soon spots Ultimo and laughs evily as he lands. the Tall 
demonic bot 
> > smirks as he looks over Ultimo for a moment.
> > 
> > Hellpeon: "Your to be my training partner? Looks more like you 
would be a 
> > squire for a fighter."
> > 
> > Hellpeon grins at that as energy begins to crackle around his 
body as the 
> > large energy being folds his arms across his chest waiting for 
the training 
> > to begin.
